original_text: There Judah saw the daughter of a certain Canaanite whose name was Shua. He took her and went in to her,
korean_text: 유다가 거기서 가나안 사람 수아라 하는 자의 딸을 보고 그를 데리고 동침하니

sentences.original_text: There Judah saw the daughter of a certain Canaanite
sentences.korean_translation: 유다는 한 가나안 족속의 딸을 보았고
